html: 5.5.17  10:56 pm   I think I understand why some people think you are waiting around to upload the video as if it isn't done. it is because on your instagram picture with the plan for HOTEWIG, you say the last thing you will do before uploading is "drop crazy hints". by a sort of literal interpretation of thay, it must seem to some that you are done now and dropping crazy hints before uploading
5.5.17  10:37 pm   Why is the ground important?
5.5.17  10:35 pm   Isn't it convenient that some letters rhyme even though they are different letters? (B, C, D, E, GP, T, V, Z)

5.5.17  10:28 pm   Is there any reason that you haven't mentioned your Patreon anywhere that I know of?

     Is it to avoid seeming like you're begging for money?
5.5.17  10:26 pm   what is a good method to introduce yourself and then have a conversation with a stranger?
5.5.17  10:08 pm   when did u get ur period
5.5.17  9:53 pm   Are you ok with me writing nice stuff on here
5.5.17  9:49 pm   hey bill will the new video be done before the ap world history exam on thursday (that way i can study off it)?
5.5.17  9:48 pm   have an estimate on your next video's release? I won't take no for an answer
5.5.17  9:45 pm   Do you think it's crazy that humanity has somehow managed to thrive despite the way we treat the earth and our own kind?
5.5.17  9:25 pm   what is your favorite pokemon

5.5.17  8:54 pm   why do you think this article (https://www.vox.com/2016/2/3/10905274/japan-history-video) points out that you missed out the japanese atrocities but does not mention all the other shit you missed out?

5.5.17  8:42 pm   how is making videos out of your journal equivalent to putting your career on hold?

     We'd all love to see your process, it wouldn't mean your career would be paused or over, in fact it would help it.
5.5.17  8:27 pm   Sometimes I feel like such an incredible nothing. Can you help me out with this issue?
5.5.17  7:58 pm   opinion of the first world war?

5.5.17  6:56 pm   why must you make the journals into videos?

     wouldn't it save time and effort to just make them into audio clips and post those?

5.5.17  6:55 pm   as your fan base grows, do you think you'll become more elusive?

     will it get to the point where your answers don't reflect who you are?
5.5.17  6:49 pm   Gravity is quite a nice instrument. Do you know how to play it?

      is it measurable?

5.5.17  12:21 pm   We've been at this for almost a year Bill. The shareholders are angry and are getting close to pulling out of the deal. Where the fuck is my fucking video?
